title: Interpretation of seeing an heir in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an heir in a dream: seeing the ruler, heir, princes, sultans, and kings in a dream. Is this vision bad or good, or does this vision show a meaning or indication of a specific thing that will happen, or is this vision extracted from the vision of a person who fears many things in his life, so the vision comes in the form of Things he thinks about from the subconscious or that seeing rulers, princes, princes and kings in a dream is a certain sign and message from Almighty God to the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing the heir clearly in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the heir in a dream. Imam Ibn Sirin said about seeing the caliph in a dream that the person with the vision carries many responsibilities and great tasks in his future, which will force him to be promoted in command. As for the one who saw in his dream that he had become the heir to the throne, Ibn Sirin said You will see that this dream indicates that the future of the visionary is the future of all success and excellence and that he will obtain his position and status. And great power in his future. If a person sees in a dream that the king has died and the heir takes over power after the king, then this vision indicates that there are many urgent changes that will occur in the country of opinion. As for the person who sees the heir in a dream but refuses to seize power in In a dream, this vision indicates the presence of chaos and many problems, and God knows best. If a person sees in a dream that he is greeting the Crown Prince sadly, then this dream shows the resolution of problems and disputes. Whoever sees that he meets the Crown Prince in a dream and feels happy. This vision expresses his gratitude to him for what he did. Whoever dreams that he is embracing the heir, this vision indicates that the dreamer will gain peace and security in his life or in the coming period of his life. Whoever sees in a dream that the heirâ€™s heir gives him money or a certain amount of money, this vision indicates that the dreamer will be blessed with a lot of money. And food. Interpretation of the Caliph in a dreamAlso, seeing gifts given to the heir in a dream indicates courtship and closeness to people who enjoy power and status and hold major positions. Whoever sees in his dream this vision is considered a violation of the laws and regulations, but if one sees in his dream that he is hitting the heir, then he He violates an elderly member of his family. As for the caliph in the dream, this indicates that the owner of the vision or the president did bad deeds, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. The person who sees in a dream that there is a meeting of kings or a king with the Crown Prince in the dream, this vision indicates many new decisions that It will appear in the country. Follow the interpretation of the heir in a dream. The crown prince in a dream indicates that this person will have great power, and whoever sees in his dream that he is guarding the king and the crown prince is with him in the same dream shows that he will have great power. This is the person who performs the night prayer and is mentioned. God. As for seeing a guard in a dream, this indicates pride and power. Whoever sees in his dream that the prince, king, or crown prince is laughing and rejoicing in the dream indicates that the dreamer will gain a great status and obey the commands of God Almighty. We have reached the end of the article, and today we talked about the interpretation of visions.

title: Ibn Sirinâ€™s interpretations of seeing the neck in a dream

preview.html: The neck in a dream. Seeing the neck is one of the visions that carries many symbols and associations. Some learned the gender of the newborn from the neck, some believed that it was suitable for women and disliked by men, while some considered it a symbol of music and musical instruments. In this article we will take a look at all the indicators and cases related to a dream about the neck. , citing details that differ from one person to another and affect the context of the dream, both negatively and positively. The neck in a dream There are many interpretations of seeing the neck in a dream, and it symbolizes many associations. It indicates good news and pleasure for the pioneer, and seeing the neck in the ear increases knowledge, faith in God, piety, and adherence to religion. And the abundance of good deeds in this world. When the dreamer sees that he is wearing an earring with a piece of pearls in his ears, this indicates that he has read the entire Qurâ€™an. It also indicates seeing honor, prestige, beauty, and goodness, and it can also indicate sorrows, misfortunes, and strife. A silver earring can indicate faith and seeing a golden earring indicates fears and difficulties in life. The neck in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing an earring in a dream symbolizes many interpretations. And multiple, so whoever sees that he is buying an earring, this means livelihood and increased income, or obtaining something valuable, or it also indicates participation in a new job. Or giving every person the right to his inheritance, and he believes that the neck symbolizes a woman, as it is a symbol of adornment, beauty and femininity, and seeing the neck in a dream indicates the gender of the awaited fetus. It also indicates that seeing the neck can indicate obedience and worship, and it can also indicate To be cautious, cautious, and beware of fear and speculation about the future. Seeing the neck disappearing in a dream has different meanings, it can indicate the end and salvation from problems and worries, anxiety from crises and can lead to disturbances and problems that hinder oneâ€™s lifestyle. The neck in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates seeing a woman A single woman has many interpretations of the earring, including that she is wearing the earring, which indicates the presence of a close relationship with a good young man or that she will find a good job and fulfill her desires and ambitions in life. But if she sees that she is removing her neck, this indicates that she has gotten rid of the problems that stand in her way. Her way or she broke off her engagement, but if she saw that there was someone helping her wear the neck. It indicates that the direct marriage took place without an engagement period. And seeing that someone gives her the earring as a gift, this indicates that she heard happy news, and it also shows that she received support and the ability to make the right decisions in life, and her vision of the silver earring shows a broad life, marriage to a good man and a good birth. Blessing and contentment in her life. What is the interpretation of a golden earring in a single womanâ€™s dream? Al-Azzaâ€™s vision of a golden earring in her dream indicates control over the affairs of her life and managing them on her own without the interference of others, and it clarifies her relationship with a person of her choice and marriage to him. It can symbolize her love for herself, and her appearance in a way Impressive and attractive to others, and her confidence

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing tomatoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Tomatoes in a dream, seeing tomatoes in a dream is a dream that has many interpretations that indicate good and happy news for the dreamer to hear good news and happy events soon, and the vision is a sign of the dreamer's upcoming huge survival regardless of the type. Whether it is a man or a woman or other, and in the following article we will learn in detail about each sign. Tomatoes in a dream Seeing tomatoes in a dream is a sign of good news for the dreamer. Seeing tomatoes in a dream is also a sign of happiness and achieving the goals that a person has long been looking forward to. Seeing tomatoes in a dream is a sign of abundant money and many good things that will come to the dreamer in the shortest possible time, God willing. Seeing tomatoes in a dream means relief from distress, loss of anxiety, and repayment of debts as soon as possible, God willing. Seeing tomatoes in a dream is a happy occasion that the dreamer will spend for a long time. Seeing tomatoes in a dream indicates a good job that the dreamer will soon get. Tomatoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin interprets seeing tomatoes in a dream as a sign of good and great happiness that will soon come to the dreamer. Seeing tomatoes in a dream is a good sign and an indication of achieving goals and success in many matters that the dreamer will soon start, God willing. Seeing tomatoes in a dream symbolizes recovery from illness and obtaining abundant wealth in the coming period. Seeing tomatoes in a man's dream is an indication of the good work that he will get in the coming period, God willing. The dream of tomatoes is a sign of the coming wide livelihood and abundant money. Seeing tomatoes in a dream is also a sign of overcoming sadness And the anxiety and anxiety that the dreamer suffered from in the past. What do tomatoes mean in a single woman's dream? Seeing tomatoes in a dream for an unmarried girl is a sign of happiness and her life will soon improve for the better, God willing. Also, dreaming of a girl who has nothing to do with tomatoes means that she will soon marry a young man of good morals and religion. Seeing tomatoes in a dream for an unmarried girl is a sign of overcoming the sadness and crises that she went through in the past. A girl's dream of tomatoes is evidence of her success in her studies next semester, God willing. If a girl sees rotten tomatoes, this is a sign of the sadness and distress she suffers from. Buying tomatoes in a dream for a single woman Seeing an unmarried girl buying tomatoes in a dream indicates a great diet and abundant money that she will soon get, God willing. Also, a girl's dream of buying tomatoes is a sign of happy circumstances and abundant goodness that will lead her in the future. If you see yourself buying tomatoes in a divorced girl's dream, this means getting rid of the crises and problems that you suffered from in the past. What do tomatoes mean in a married woman's dream? A married woman who sees tomatoes in a dream symbolizes stability and improvement of her life affairs for the better soon, God willing. Seeing tomatoes in a dream for a married woman means

title: I saw that I was pregnant in a dream

preview.html: I saw that I was pregnant in a dream. The interpretation of visions and dreams is considered a hypothetical science, that is, it cannot be relied upon or judged, and the realization of these dreams and visions remains in the hands of God Almighty alone. We will give you the interpretation of seeing a pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of the appearance of a pregnancy in a dream by Abdul-Ghani al-Nabulsi. Seeing a pregnancy is one of the visions that have many explanations and interpretations around it, and in the following lines we will give you Abdul-Ghani al-Nabulsiâ€™s interpretation of seeing a pregnancy in a dream. Abdul-Ghani al-Nabulsi talked about many possibilities for interpreting the vision of a pregnancy in a dream. A dream, where he said that seeing a pregnancy in a dream could mean that a woman has a good reputation among people and attains honour, pride and reputation. The dreamer was a man. But if the one who saw the pregnancy in the dream was an unmarried girl, this is evidence that she will be a source of distress and anxiety for her family, and her family may suffer because of her from many conflicts and problems. If the viewer who sees the pregnancy in the dream is a man, this means that This person is burdened with problems, worries, fear, and anxiety, but he hides all of this from people, while in the event that the viewer sees a pregnancy in a dream, he is a man of knowledge, and this is evidence of his increasing knowledge, and transcendence and success in what he studies and learns. Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi added some interpretations of seeing a pregnancy in a dream. A dream where he said that seeing a pregnancy in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is hiding a very important matter and this matter will appear later or cause him illness and fatigue. There is another interpretation of seeing a pregnancy in a dream, as it indicates the theft of something by a fortune teller or a thief who breaks into the house and steals a lot. Of his property. Loaded with sins and disobedience, he must quickly turn to God Almighty and review his accounts and obedience to God. Interpretation of Ibn Al-Ghannam on seeing a pregnancy in a dream The translator Ibrahim bin Al-Ghannam interpreted the vision of a pregnancy in a dream as follows: Where he said that seeing a pregnancy in a dream for a married woman could indicate the necessity of... Her commitment to doing something that will help her achieve fame and money. Green spaces and increased kindness. Ibn Sirinâ€™s interpretation of seeing childbirth in a dream. The great translator Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of childbirth in a dream as follows: Where he said that whoever is pregnant in reality and dreams that she is giving birth to a girl, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy in reality and vice versa. Contrary to a dream. Giving birth to a male baby, this dream may indicate the approach of great sadness, financial distress, problems and difficulties. Loss of his money and status or someoneâ€™s control over him. But if a married woman sees that she is pregnant in a dream, this indicates success in her life, and good luck, because it indicates profit in business. It also indicates earning money, increasing livelihood, and progress in the scientific and practical fields in the near future, with permission. God. At the end of this article, I hope that I have succeeded in presenting the interpretation of seeing a pregnancy in a dream, whether the fortuneteller is a man, a woman, or an unmarried girl, as we mentioned the interpretation of many commentators, such as that of Ibn Sirin. Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsiâ€™s interpretation and Ibn Al-Ghannamâ€™s interpretation of seeing a pregnancy in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing prayers upon the Prophet Muhammad in a dream according to the interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a supplication for the Prophet Muhammad in a dream, according to the interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq. Praying for the Messenger of God is one of the actions that God loves more than His servants and decrees for them a lot of reward and goodness. The dreamer is close to God and is ready to follow the Sunnah of the Prophet and read the noble hadiths, and it is good news of the appearance of the enemy with beautiful things. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Praying for the Prophet Muhammad, may Godâ€™s prayers and peace be upon him. Praying for our master Muhammad, may Godâ€™s prayers and peace be upon him, is the best prayer and peace among the visions that overflow with goodness, because praying for the Prophet in reality has a great reward, and the Muslimâ€™s evidence of that. Collecting good deeds and earning them in this world and the hereafter. And the man himself calls on our master and beloved Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream so that the man will give him goodness and happiness. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Prophet Muhammad praying in a dream is the interpretation of Imam al-Sadiq. The vision of praying for the Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him, his family, and his companions and grant them peace, is interpreted according to the situation in which the dreamer lives for the sake of this vision, Interpretations vary depending on the person who saw this vision. Male or female, married or single, single or married or pregnant, the vision also differs in interpretation depending on whether the dreamer is happy in his life and feels satisfied or distant. By God Almighty, or sick, and the like, and we will tell you all the cases that Imam Al-Sadiq explained to us about the blessing of our Master Muhammad, peace and blessings be upon him, his family and companions. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Prophet Muhammadâ€™s supplication in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried girl as if she is praying for our master and beloved Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream, indicates great goodness that will come to this girl soon, as she will have a good husband the next day. It is also evidence that her married life is stable and makes you happy, and it is also evidence of relieving stress and changing the situation for the better, God willing. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Prophet Muhammad praying in a pregnant womanâ€™s dream. As for seeing a pregnant woman in her dream praying for the Prophet Muhammad, this vision has two interpretations: These two interpretations are closely related to this womanâ€™s pregnancy, and it can also be said that this vision is very good news for the pregnant woman. This vision promises her that she will give birth easily, God willing, and in good health during pregnancy. The second interpretation is related to the child she will give birth to and the interpretation of the vision. This indicates that this child that this woman will give birth to will be a righteous son and that it will be God Almightyâ€™s reward for this woman, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Prophet Muhammad praying in a dream about a married woman. As for a married woman who sees in her dream that she is praying for the Prophet Muhammad, this is evidence. Good news for her and that she will give birth to a child who will be among the righteous, God willing. Enjoy a happy and satisfied life. Seeing all the details related to the Messenger of God and praying for him is considered a positive dream, and reflects the image of Godâ€™s kindness, his closeness to God, his appetite for worship, and that he continues to read supplications and the Holy Quran before sleep.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my only friendâ€™s engagement in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about my unmarried friendâ€™s engagement? Interpretation of a dream about my only friendâ€™s engagement. When does this dream mean good? What symbols appear in the vision that completely change their meaning from positive to negative? Does the meaning of the dream change depending on the social status of this friend? All these questions will be fully answered in the following article.You have a dream that confuses you. Wait... Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about my only friendâ€™s engagement. If a girl dreams of her friendâ€™s engagement, knowing that this friend is also single, then the dream may indicate her marriage to her, but when this friend is seen dancing at the engagement party, the dream indicates a serious illness. He lies in her body for a while. A period of time and the dream may indicate severe crises in that girlâ€™s life. If the dreamer sees her friend hiding in a dream while wearing a torn and dirty dress, knowing that the dreamerâ€™s friend is already engaged, then the dream is bad in this case and shows her engagement being canceled due to many disagreements with her fiancÃ©. When the dreamer's girlfriend appears in a dream happy with her engagement and continues to sing loudly until the end of the dream, then in reality she is suffering because of a great misfortune and misfortune that has befallen her in her life. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she and her friend are engaged, and both are happy in this case, then perhaps he will get married. The dreamer is at the same time that her friend is already getting married. Interpretation of dreams about the engagement of my only friend to Ibn Sirin. The engagement falls under the heading of weddings and nuptials in terms of dream interpretation, and Ibn Sirin did not hate the symbol of marriage or engagement in the dream, but he hated the celebration events within it in terms of loud singing. Strange dances, loud voices, and bright clothes, and if the dream is full of these annoying things, then this indicates successive sorrows in the life of the mother and her friend. But if the dreamerâ€™s friend was engaged in a dream without hearing music or noise in the dream, then the scene indicates great happiness for this friend, by God. He gives her sustenance and blessings soon. If the dreamer sees that her fiancÃ©e is wearing an engagement ring that is crooked or narrow in relation to the size of her finger, then the dream reveals that the dreamerâ€™s girlfriend will enter into a bad love relationship and fail due to the fiancÃ©â€™s misconduct. The most important interpretations of a dream about my single friendâ€™s engagement. I dreamed about my friendâ€™s engagement. Dream interpretation of my friendâ€™s engagement in a dream. Wearing a white gold ring is a sign of her marriage to a person whose intentions are pure and whose personality is full of positive traits. What does her friend wear at the engagement party in a dream? This indicates that the fortuneteller will marry a young man who resembles her friendâ€™s husband in appearance or personal characteristics. Interpretation of a dream about the engagement of someone I know. If the dreamer saw the engagement of one of her acquaintances in a dream, and this person was naked and sat in this bad state in front of peopleâ€™s eyes. The symbol of engagement with the symbol of the naked person in a dream indicates a scandal that many people witness, but if the dreamer sees that her fiancÃ© announces his engagement to another girl, and this girl is beautiful and beautiful in appearance and features. Her friend's engagement, with Al

title: Interpretation of a dream about red silk in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about red silk in a dream Some people may want to know the interpretation of a dream about red silk in a dream, and it is one of the disturbing dreams for which the dreamer wants to know an interpretation, but he must pay attention to it. Interpretations are the diligence of interpretation scholars and the site managers have nothing to do with it, so one must be careful and not put complete trust in these interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about red silk in a dream Seeing red silk in a dream could mean that the dreamer will face a big problem during this period, and God knows best. And whoever sees that he is carrying red silk, this indicates that he is spreading heresy to whoever has the vision and he must repent to God, Blessed and Most High. If one sees silk in a dream, this may indicate happiness and joys for the dreamer, thanks to God. If one sees that he is getting red silk This may indicate his distance from God, Blessed and Most High, and he must repent and approach God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about wearing wool in a dream: Wearing wool in a dream may indicate the great benefit that the person with the vision can reap in his life during those days. And in the event that he sees Oneself wearing wool, this may be an indication of the positive changes that occur in oneâ€™s insight during this period, and God knows best. If one sees himself wearing wool in a dream, this may indicate positive events that will come to the dreamerâ€™s life in those days, thanks to God. To see yourself and Wearing wool in a dream, this indicates an abundance of money in visions and material gains during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating wool in a dream If one sees that he is eating wool in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will face some problems and difficulties in his life during that period. If you see yourself eating wool in a dream, this may indicate an inability to satisfy desires and dreams during this period, and God knows best. If a person sees himself eating wool, this may indicate obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life during those days, and God knows best. Seeing him eating wool may indicate In a dream, it may indicate the psychological disturbances that the dreamer feels in his life in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about asking for wool from a dead person in a dream. If one sees that the dead person asks for wool, this may indicate good deeds from my point of view, and praise be to God. In the event that He saw the deceased asking for wool in a dream, this may indicate that he was a very supportive person for others at that time. It is possible that seeing the deceased asking for wool in a dream indicates the need of the deceased for prayers and charity for him in this period, thanks to God. And in the event that a person sees that the deceased was asking Of wool, this may indicate positive changes that occur in his lifeâ€™s insight during those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about burning wool in a dream Burning wool in a dream may indicate that the dreamer has abandoned his religion and must repent and return to God, Blessed and Most High. And in the event that If one sees wool burning, it may indicate the inability to achieve the goals and ambitions of those days, and God knows best. If one sees that he is burning wool

title: Interpretation of a dream about warts by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing warts in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, for a wart on the face, body, hand, leg and neck, I dreamed of red discs, the white substance comes out of Ibn Sirin and others Interpretation of seeing a wart or pimple in a dream by Ibn Shaheen A wart, pimple or pimple in a dream is one of the dreams that we see often in a dream, because this is due to the constant thinking about the beauty of the skin and you have to take care of it completely, because the subconscious mind thinks about it, and it is considered that seeing it in a dream is one of the disturbing dreams that cause a lot of anxiety for a person, such as seeing pimples on the face or pimples. In a dream, there are many interpretations that we will review about you, as explained by the interpreter Ibn Shaheen in his interpretations. Interpretation of a wart in a dream It is money in a dream. Whoever sees that he is infected with warts, he will have money that grows endlessly, and he fears that it will disappear. If you are disturbed by the appearance of warts on your body in dreams, you will not be able to successfully avoid stab wounds for your honor. And if you see that it disappears from your hands, this portends that you will overcome unexpected obstacles for the sake of wealth, but if you see it in others, it means that you have fierce enemies near you If you face it, you will fight hard to ward off a threat to you and your property. The appearance of red pimples on the head in a dream is evidence that one of the sons will become a scholar. Seeing a brown wart in a dream is a sign of envy. Seeing a wart in many ways in a dream is a sign of moving away from God. Eating the pus that comes out of a wart is evidence of the presence of illegitimate money. Seeing a wart or pimple in a dream is a sign of good news coming to a person, dignity and status in this world. The appearance of a bad smell from Warts in a dream indicate debts and worries. When a wart or pimple appears on the hand, neck or palm in a dream, this is evidence of an abundance of money and livelihood. The appearance of a wart all over the body in a dream is a sign of comfort. Seeing a wart or pimple on the leg or foot in a dream is evidence of travel and trade. The black water coming out of warts in a dream is evidence of removing problems. Interpretation of a wart in a dream for a single woman Seeing a wart or pimple in a dream for an unmarried girl means success in work and study. Seeing a wart or pimple for individuals indicates happy news. As for the unmarried girl who sees a wart or warts in a dream, it is evidence of marriage or engagement in the near future. The appearance of a wart or pimples all over the girl's body is evidence of her love for someone. Seeing freckles on the face of an unmarried woman in a dream indicates that there are mistakes in her life that need to be corrected. A wart or pimple in a dream indicates passion and romance. The appearance of warts and pimples on a person's body, neck or hand is evidence of comfort. But the appearance of a white wart for a girl Unmarried in a dream is evidence of an approaching marriage. Seeing a pink wart in a dream is a sign of joy and happiness. And when you see the pimples

title: Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi for single women, pregnant women, married women and men according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The secrets of interpreting a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi for single, pregnant, married, widowed, divorced, and various other situations. It is one of the most common dreams that people experience, especially for those who continue to read it in reality. Yes, to protect the soul from any harm that befalls it, but what do you think of seeing him reciting Ayat al-Kursi in a dream? Reciting Ayat al-Kursi in a dream out of fear is found in this article on the encyclopedia website. Many people wonder about the meaning of reading verses from the Holy Qurâ€™an in a dream, especially Ayat al-Kursi because it has a special status for a Muslim, because of its great value and status. Therefore, when someone dreams about it and wants to get a clear interpretation of his dream, we will look at the most famous interpretations that he said. Scholars, and interpretation for unmarried people, married people, and others, and we will also point out: A simple dream interpretation application that can be used and get the interpretation of your sleep in an easy and simple way while maintaining your privacy in the form. Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi for a single woman. Many interpreters have agreed, including Ibn Sirin, as well as Ibn Shaheen, However, seeing the recitation of Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is a dream that often indicates happiness and abundance of sustenance. If an unmarried woman sees herself reading the surah, then her dream is a sign that she will enjoy a state of security and happiness, so her mind will be good and her mind will be calm. Perhaps this dream is for an unmarried woman. A married woman is evidence that she will obtain a lot of money, whether through profit or inheritance. In other cases, seeing this verse is a sign of marriage, especially if there is someone who recites the words of God Almighty and the single woman is hesitant to follow him. This person is also pious, as he protects This girl is very happy with him because he teaches her a lot about religion. Some interpreted seeing Ayat al-Kursi in a dream as evidence of the dreamerâ€™s closeness to God Almighty, as well as her constant desire to continue on his path and avoid committing sins and disobedience. Others suggested that Ayat al-Kursi may be strong evidence of the ability of its owner. Dreaming about reaching her long-awaited dreams. Seeing a girl reciting Ayat al-Kursi over the jinn in her dream is evidence of the strength of her faith, which will save her from the problems she suffers from, and thus fear and distraction will remove her and she will enjoy a state of being. Happiness and peace in life. If an unmarried girl finds herself in a dream as if she is waking up to the sound of this surah, then this dream promises her that she will be able to visit places she has lost or see some people after a period of absence. As for an unmarried woman who hears the sound of what is recited in Ayat al-Kursi is a sign that she hears a lot of good and joyful news. If Ayat al-Kursi is accompanied by a lot of crying and humility, then this is a sign of relief from God Almighty and freedom from distress. But if Ayat al-Kursi is written in a dream, this dream indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many Of the tribulations and crises in which you will turn to God Almighty to solve them. As for an unmarried woman who hears the sound of what is recited in Ayat al-Kursi is a sign that she hears a lot of good and joyful news. If Ayat al-Kursi is accompanied by a lot of crying and humility, then this is a sign of relief from God Almighty and freedom from distress. But if Ayat al-Kursi is written in a dream, this dream indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many Of the tribulations and crises in which you will turn to God Almighty to solve them. Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi with difficulty: If an unmarried woman sees that she cannot read it in a dream or encounters difficulty
